text:
batik should provide a means to navigate anchors in SVG resources using 
a keyboard, aka tabbing.

Whilst keyboard navigation is not part of the SVG1.1 spec, the other 
native SVG browsers: Mozilla, Safari and Opera all do support keyboard 
navigation.
